items.name: useTutorialProgress
items.returnType: { progress: TutorialProgress; setCurrentChapter: (chapter: TutorialChapter | null) => void; setCurrentStep: (stepIndex: number) => void; markChapterComplete: (chapter: TutorialChapter) => void; resetProgress: () => void; hasVisitedPage: (chapter: TutorialChapter) => boolean; markPageVisited: (chapter: TutorialChapter) => void; }
